//******
var containsUndefined=function containsUndefined(l,r){return l===undefined||r===undefined;};export var uNot=function uNot(v){return v===undefined?undefined:!v;};export var uAnd=function uAnd(l,r){return containsUndefined(l,r)?undefined:l&&r;};export var uOr=function uOr(l,r){return containsUndefined(l,r)?undefined:l||r;};export var TRUE='True';export var FALSE='False';export var UNDEF='Undefined';export var uBoolToName=function uBoolToName(value){if(value===true)return TRUE;if(value===false)return FALSE;return UNDEF;};
